1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Nihan starts having fear of what will happen since her ex boyfriend and the man she still loves came back. She fears that he will ruin her life and mess up her routine. She is afraid that he will know the real reason behind their break up.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Kemal and Nihan are alone in the boat with other strangers. Kemal tries to not show his never ending love to her. As she starts showing him that she is the same lovely person he loved, and he is the one who changed to the worst. Her husband,Emir finds out about the old relationship between his wife. ( Nihan) and his new partner in work (Kemal). At the end of this episode Kemal realizes something that will change many things.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Kemal finally shows Nihan the pieces of his broken heart. She is relieved that he doesn't hate her, and that all his mean acts were because of his broken heart. Her husband is making plans on destroying Kemal's life using his family. He knows all about their relationship but doesn't tell them that he knows. He has more powerful plans.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Nihan goes back to her life that she is forced to live. Kemal's family is afraid he is going to become heart broken once again. Kemal and Nihan notice some things that lead them into questioning the fact the Emir knows about them. Thing bring Nihan and Kemal together. The revenge in Kemal's heart start getting less and less as time passes by with Nihan. In the end they are both so close to being caught together as Kemal's big moves shows.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Kemal buys the house that Nihan and Kemal once dreamed of buying together. It is the neighboring house of Nihan and her jealous husband. Kemal begins to see that Nihan has suffered the past 5 years, and is possibly still in love with him. Kemal tries to figure out what Nihan might be hiding.

imdb.plot outline: A young girl is forced to give up her love life for the sake of her family. Five years later they finally meet and are obviously still in love with each other. However, they can't be together because she is now married to a psychopath who has no limits or what so ever. It's a love triangle with lots of drama and mystery.
imdb.title: Kara Sevda
plot: A young artist finds herself obligated to sacrifice her love story for hiding a family secret.

A young girl is forced to give up her love life for the sake of her family. Five years later they finally meet and are obviously still in love with each other. However, they can't be together because she is now married to a psychopath who has no limits or what so ever. It's a love triangle with lots of drama and mystery.
